ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have We not given him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Did We not give him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Did We not grant him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have We not given him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did We not make two eyes for him?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Have We not made for him two eyes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Have We not given him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have We not appointed to him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Did We not assign unto him two eyes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Have We not given him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Have We not, made for him two eyes
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have We not made for him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Have We not made for him a pair of eyes?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Have We not made for him a pair of eyes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have We not given him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Did We not give him two eyes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Have We not made for him two eyes?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [90:8]   Have We not given (an interrogative meant as an affirmative, in other words, ‘We have [certainly] given’) him two eyes,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then mentioned the blessings He bestowed upon him, saying: (Did We not assign unto him two eyes) with which he sees
